ValidationRule.description: Activation End Date should be less than or equal to Staff Giving Portal Publish End Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Activation_End_Date__c) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Activation_End_Date__c)), Activation_End_Date__c > Staff_Giving_Portal_Publish_End_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Activation End Date should be less than or equal to Staff Giving Portal Publish End Date.
